name: Kookjin Lee
content: Kookjin Lee | ASU Search Kookjin Lee Assistant Professor, School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence Other ASU affiliations Biodesign Center for Biocomputing, Security and Society [email protected] 699 S Mill Ave BYENG 568 Tempe, AZ 85281 Mail code: 8809 Campus: Tempe ‌ Long Bio Kookjin Lee is an assistant professor in the School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence. He studies scientific machine learning, an interdisciplinary area including deep learning, computational physics and applied mathematics. In particular, he is interested in deep learning for dynamical systems and spatiotemporal process modeling. One of his papers has been recognized as one of the best cited papers in a premier computational physics journal in 2020.
